title: Did Arizona GOP Rep. Ask: "If masks are working, why were they not needed in the AIDS crisis?"
subtitle: Joseph Chaplik met with fun after remarks while calling for a bill to exempt businesses in Arizona from disguised states.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Joseph Chaplik, Head of State of Arizona, objected to the effectiveness and necessity of facial masks by pointing out that masked states were not widely used to combat the spread of HIV.
